title: Which statement about OCI compartments is NOT true?

answers.answer: It is a best practice to create all your resources in the root compartment.
A compartment is a logical collection of related resources.
Compartments help to isolate and control access to resources.

title: Which Identity and Access Management component helps to organize multiple users into a team?
Which statement about OCI Identity and Access Management is true?

answers.answer: It is used to protect information on devices.
It enables you to control access for a group of users.
It enables authentication for devices only
It enables authorization for on-premises users only
